feed.title: Security Advisory for Java artifacts hosted at the Maven central repository
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for Java artifacts hosted at the Maven central repository on GitHub

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP May Reveal S3 Store's Proxy Password
entry.content:
The Portal Store module in Liferay Portal 7.0.0 through 7.3.5, and Liferay DXP 7.0 before fix pack 97, 7.1 before fix pack 21, 7.2 before fix pack 10 and 7.3 before fix pack 1 does not obfuscate the S3 store's proxy password, which allows attackers to steal the proxy password via man-in-the-middle attacks or shoulder surfing.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-29043
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120743515
  • http://liferay.com
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210517183617/https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120743515
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xx2h-2hf5-v7vv

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Allows Arbitrary Redirect of Users to External URLs
entry.content:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Notifications module in Liferay Portal 7.0.0 through 7.3.1, and Liferay DXP 7.0 before fix pack 94, 7.1 before fix pack 19 and 7.2 before fix pack 8, allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary external URLs via the 'redirect' parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33331
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17022
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747627
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mj8w-h522-jwm8

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Don't Check Permissions of Pages
entry.content:
The Layout module in Liferay Portal 7.1.0 through 7.3.1, and Liferay DXP 7.1 before fix pack 20, and 7.2 before fix pack 5, does not properly check permission of pages, which allows remote authenticated users without view permission of a page to view the page via a site's page administration.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33324
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17001
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747063
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220828222955/https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747063
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-474f-cmx5-gm69

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Reveals Data via Overly Verbose Error Messages
entry.content:
The JSON web services in Liferay Portal 7.3.4 and earlier, and Liferay DXP 7.0 before fix pack 97, 7.1 before fix pack 20 and 7.2 before fix pack 10 may provide overly verbose error messages, which allows remote attackers to use the contents of error messages to help launch another, more focused attacks via crafted inputs.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-29040
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120743429
  • http://liferay.com
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220828222656/https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120743429
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-87x7-pwrx-jch7

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:com.liferay.portal.impl] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Bypass via Double Encoded URL
entry.content:
In Liferay Portal before 7.3.1, com.liferay.portal:com.liferay.portal.impl before 7.1.3 and 7.4.0, Liferay Portal 6.2 EE, and Liferay DXP 7.2, DXP 7.1 and DXP 7.0, the property 'portlet.resource.id.banned.paths.regexp' can be bypassed with doubled encoded URLs.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-15840
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17046
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/119772204
  • https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JAVA-COMLIFERAYPORTAL-1296538
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-vrwx-q9pj-x488
